column4: i have connected an old hard dsik from my old ubuntu computer, i have access to it but i can't find where evolution sores files... doesn't anyone know where these are
evolution stores it's stuff under ~/.evolution, in a very complex manner.
you trying to pull out your mail?
and, do you have use of evolution? (gtk/gnome programs sometimes flood warnings about recoverable things)
the quick check would be to create a new user, and see if evolution will run for that user
